description: Move devices like windows or blinds based on timing information to a selected position.This module can also ensure that two automation devices operating on the same physical object (ie. window opener and blinds motor mounted on the same window) do not interfere with eachother.
icon_helper: Select the icon to be used for the virtual devices
related_check_helper: Check for other devices operating on the same physical object. Ie. ensures that a blind cannot be closed above a certain limit if the related window opener has opened the window
related_device_limit_helper: Constrain current device if the related device is above or below (depending on the comparison operator) the given limit.
report_helper: Sensor that reports the correct device state
time_helper: Time in seconds to fully open/close device
title: Move blinds/windows to selected position
